column2: "Dɛm ntsi sɛ Kraest mu nkuranhyɛ bi
column5: eso ayamuhyehye nye tsimbɔbɔr bi wɔ hɔ a
column7: "hom nhyɛ me dɛw ma dɛ hom bɔdwen adze kor

column2: "Mma hom nnyɛ biribi mansotwe do
column4: na mbom obiara mfa ahobrɛadze adwen do mbu ne nyɛnko nkyɛn nankasa noho;"

column2: "mma obiara nnhwɛ no nko n’adze
column3: na mbom ɔnhwɛ obinom so dze bi."

column2: "Hom nnya adwen a ɔwɔ Kraest Jesus mu no bi wɔ hom mu;"
"ɔno a dɛ ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn subea
column3: naaso oenngyina do ketsee araa dɛ ɔnye Nyankopɔn yɛ pɛr
column6: faa akowaa tsebea too no do ma wɔwoo no dɛ nyimpa. Na wohun no nyimpa su mu no
column8: "ɔbrɛɛ noho adze na ɔyɛɛ setsie araa kesii owu mu

column2: "Dɛm ntsi so nna Nyankopɔn ama no do kɛsekɛse na ɔama no dzin bi dzin a ɔbɔ dzin biara do:"
"dɛ
"na tɛkyerɛma nyina apaa mu aka dɛ Jesus Kraest nye Ewuradze dze ahyɛ Nyankopɔn Egya no enyimnyam."
"Dɛm ntsi
column4: dɛ mbrɛ daa hom yɛ setsie
column5: nnyɛ ber a mowɔ hom nkyɛn nko
column6: na mbom afei a minnyi hom nkyɛn yi kɛse
column7: hom mfa suro nye ahopopo nyɛ homankasa hom nkwagye ho edwuma nwie;"

column2: "na Nyankopɔn nna ɔyɛ hom mu edwuma ma hom nya pɛ na hom yɛ edwuma a ɔfata nankasa n’enyisɔ."
"Mma hom mmfa ehwinhwin nye nyiyiano nyɛ dza hom yɛ biara
column4: "ama hom aayɛ nyimpa a asɛm bi nnyi hom ho
column6: Nyankopɔn ne mba a nkekae bi nnyi hɔn ho
column7: a wɔtse mbasantsen kɔntɔnkye nkyeakyeae mu
column8: na hɔn mu na hom hyerɛn dɛ nkandzea wɔ wiadze mu."

column2: "Sɛ hom suo nkwasɛm no mu yie a
column3: nna meenya dza medze bɛhyehyɛ moho wɔ Kraest da no mu
column4: dɛ menntutu mbirika gyan eso mammberɛ kwa."

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
column3: sɛ mpo wohue me gu dɛ afɔrbɔ wɔ hom gyedzi som ho a
column5: na menye hom nyina dzi ehurusi:"

column2: "dɛmara na hom so ndzi dɛw na hom nye me ndzi ehurusi."
"Na m’enyi da do wɔ Ewuradze Jesus mu dɛ mobɔsoma Timoti wɔ hom nkyɛn ntsɛmara
column3: ama metse hom asetsena mu nsɛm a

column2: "Na minnyi obiara ɔtse dɛ ɔno a ɔbɔdwen hom asetsena ho yie bi."
"Na hɔn nyina hwehwɛ hɔnankasa hɔndze
column3: na nnyɛ dza ɔyɛ Kraest Jesus dze bi a."

column2: "Na hom nyim mbrɛ osi na ɔnye me som wɔ asɛmpa no afamu dɛ mbrɛ ɔba nye egya tse ara."
"Ɔno na m’enyi da no do dɛ sɛ minya hu mbrɛ m’asɛm yi bowie me ara pɛr a
"na medze mo werɛ ahyɛ Ewuradze mu dɛ ɔnnkɛkyɛr biara na mankasa so maba."
"Naaso muhun dɛ ohia dɛ mosoma Epafroditus a ɔyɛ mo nua nye me nyɛnko dwumayɛfo
column5: nye me hia ho somfo no

column2: "osiandɛ ɔfee hom nyina
column3: na ɔhaw no pii dɛ hom tsee dɛ ɔyar."

column2: "Nyew
column7: amma meennya awerɛhow ammbɔ awerɛhow do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mabɔ mbɔdzen ara asoma no
column3: ama hom hu no bio a
column5: na mo so m’awerɛhow do eehuan."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom mfa dɛw nyina ngye no wɔ Ewuradze mu
column3: na hɔn a wɔtse dɛm no hom nsuo hɔn mu wɔ enyidzi mu:"

column2: "osiandɛ Kraest n’edwuma ntsi na ɔbɛɛn owu
column3: na otuu no ho sii hɔ
column4: dɛ ɔbɛma dza aka wɔ hom afamu wɔ mo ho som mu no ahyɛ ma."
